entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is a Christmas event where students from Hogwarts attend a feast and dance.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts who attends the Yule Ball with Hermione. He is incredulous when she says she needs three hours to get ready.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a student at Hogwarts who attends the Yule Ball with Ron. She waves goodbye to him and disappears into the castle.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley throws a snowball that hits Ron on the side of the head, distracting him from his conversation with Hermione.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a portrait who guards the entrance to the common room. She is extremely tipsy and lets Ron and Harry inside after they give her the password.

entities.name: violet
entities.description: Violet is the Fat Lady's friend who is also extremely tipsy and drinking chocolate liqueurs with her.

relationships.description: Ron Weasley attends the Yule Ball with Hermione Granger, as mentioned in the text: '“Who’re you going with?” he yelled after Hermione...’
Ron Weasley is a brother of George Weasley, as mentioned in the text: 'George, hit him hard on the side of the head.'
Hermione Granger attends the Yule Ball with Ron Weasley, as mentioned in the text: '“Who’re you going with?” he yelled after Hermione...’
The Fat Lady is friends with Violet, as mentioned in the text: 'The Fat Lady was sitting  in her frame with her friend Violet from downstairs...'
Ron Weasley interacts with the Fat Lady when he and Harry give her the password to let them inside.
